name: ancient-brass-dragon-xmm
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Illustration of ancient-brass-dragon-xmm, highlight musculature and unique limbs, include human silhouette, three-color palette, underwater/sky/merged zone, depict motion, detailed concept art, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Avoid embedded text or words unless specified; never render gibberish strings., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Concept art of ancient-brass-dragon-xmm with anatomy, scale, and environment.
revised_prompt: Generate a detailed concept art of a heroic tabletop fantasy scene in a consistent painterly style, using a three-color palette of teals, deep blues, and sea-greens with pearl highlights. Include an ancient brass dragon with enhanced musculature and unique limbs, alongside a human silhouette for scale. The dragon should be designed with an emphasis on aquatic fantasy realism, featuring bioluminescent accents and crafted from materials resonating subsurface caustics. All elements, including gear and accessories, should be culturally coherent and grounded in medieval-fantasy, with no modern technology or signage. The setting is a surreal merger of underwater and sky zones, denoting movement and highlighting the pressure-dome environment. Ensure clarity in the illustration by avoiding embedded text or meaningless symbols, and steer clear of sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, and anime style.
